executiveSummary: Alicia and her husband DNE from Columbus, Ohio, pitched their company Nutter on Shark Tank, seeking $500,000 for 5% equity. They showcased their plant-based milk-making machine, discussed their sales growth and margins, but ultimately did not secure an investment after all sharks declined to invest due to valuation concerns.
nextSteps: The founders will continue to grow Nutter independently following the show, likely leveraging existing sales momentum and influencer marketing strategies.
